name: Bobby B Good
text: Mondays and Wednesdays is all you can eat pepperoni pizza and cheese pizza. You can also have pasta plates that is all you can eat. The cost is $4.99 and they serve you two slices of pizza at a time.

name: Catherine Booker
text: I enjoy their loyalty rewards. They are almost always fast. Over the past year have only messed up my order twice but gave me credit for the food. The staff is always friendly and polite.

name: Bubba Leduc
text: The pizza was average in taste and their large is the size of a medium pizza anywhere else. The price they charged wasn't what was on the board (no indication of whether tax is included in the posted price). All in all, I see no reason to return.

name: Marixa North
text: The manager at this location does not like his job nor does he like to serve. Went there after 4 on a Tuesday for the buffet. They only offer cheese or pepperoni pizza and pasta. Never got the pasta and our first round of pizza was old â€¦More

name: Stephen Priest
text: I am not a big pizza fan but I like their pizza. Prices are reasonable. Pizzas could use more sauce and cheese. Crust has unique flavor from other pizzarias. Great service. â€¦More

name: Michael McKenzie
text: My go to Italian style pizza in a pinch.  It's a chain.  I grew up with this pizza.  So I love it, but you can find better if you have the time.

name: Shawn Twombly
text: I like to switch it up between the chains. I really enjoy their cheese pizza. it's also pretty cool to order a cheese burger and fries if you don't feel like pizza.

name: John Mashinsky
text: Went there tonight for the all you can eat pizza. The manager advised they were very busy with just 3 people and advised it wpuld be a long wait but they did great and I was pleasantly suprised and pleased with the service we got. Pizza was very good and nice an hot.

name: Lyman Mccrea
text: Absolutely love their pizza,  no one else has the distinct flavor that says this is real Italian!!

name: Britta Siemen
text: My parents and I ordered a large pizza and an Italian sub at 5pm and was told it'd be a 50 minute wait; an hour and a half later the food arrived and unfortunately the pizza was cold. Not even lukewarm. Very disappointed.

name: Kevin
text: Screw this place.  Don't order unless you like not eating. Paid 40 dollars for delivery at 8:30 and was told it would take 2 hours even though they close at 9:30. They guy said that's was no problem and they'd deliver after they close. Food never showed up. Left us hungry at 10:45 at night with no options. Great business.

name: Kenneth French
text: Its pizza, my wife loves the sauce, to keep her happy we go there from time to time. Very accommodating.

name: David Moreno
text: I just ordered for delivery to my hotel and what service they give there! Cody took my order he was very polite and saved me money by suggesting a better deal! I'm very happy I decided on papa ginos tonight!

name: Nick Zafris
text: I love love love Papa Gino's!!!!! can't get enough of it. I'm heading there again right after I write this review. Spaghetti, meatballs, you name it. I've been to every Papa Gino's in the country and the one in Seabrook, NH, hands down the â€¦More

name: Peter A. Koutzoukis
text: Ordered online.  Ready right on time. Excellent as usual.

name: Leah Mooradian
text: The staff was friendly and helpful.  Food was ready quickly too!!

name: Tom Riley
text: Lil. Dirty. In mens room mo soap.  Restaurant  it self could use good cleaning.   Music in dining  room  area.

name: Jody B
text: The best pizza chain out there. Don't bother with dominoes or the hut.

name: Jane
text: Customer service at this location is extremely poor. After eating there again today my husband and I decided it will be our last. An error was made by the person placing our order and when we pointed out that we had been over charged, this â€¦More

name: John Mcdonough
text: The pizza was fresh and the manger and staff where nice

name: Jerry bollinger
text: Great pizza's, chicken wings, steak subs and many other items.

name: Lisa Finch
text: Great pizza and salads.  Friendly courteous Staff.  Great location!

name: Julie Sirois
text: The worst. Stood in line to order 15 minutes 1 person ahead of us got my pizza in 28 minutes and no fries they forgot I watched others wait as long as us only 4 people there. They let the phone ring of the hook for over 45 minutes while we â€¦More

name: Phillip Scolardi
text:
I was at this location on Saturday 5/6 at around 10pm.
I am a life-long New Englander and I have been to Papa Gino's restaurants all over the region. This was by far the best experience I have had at any location â€¦More

name: Tia Kelly
text: The kids weren't impressed with the pizza because it's not like what they are used to but the service was great and the place was kept clean.

name: Jose Torres
text: GOOD FOOD AND GREAT SERVICE

name: I Score BaCkWaRdZ
text: Favorite Papa Ginos around. Friendly and fast service. Would highly reccommend

name: Carlo Castronovo
text: Not bad food. Clean restaurant.  Lol on the pricy side price wise.

name: deb cassidy
text: Great pizza deals on app, sign up for email offers and get their rewards card.

name: Haley Mondello
text: Josh is absolutely amazing and exhibits excellent customer service. Very pleased.

name: Lord Ryan
text: Great service, friendly and willing to go the extra mile help with any taste bud needs!

name: Jay Stevens
text: The employees here is what brings us back time and again. Also the $5 all you eat is a hell of a deal

name: Darla MAHONEY
text: Took 30 min to get chicken tenders and a salad. 3 people came in 15 min after we order 3 people came in and orderd and got the order with in 5 min we ended up just saying to them that we would just take what was ready and it turned out it was all read and cold.

name: Bea Keller
text: Ordered 2 large pepperoni. They were kind enough to bring plastic silverware, however the crust was so hard you couldn't cut it. Would not recommend.

name: Jack T
text: I always get burger and mushroom, don't be so skimpy with the burger

name: John Smith
text: Horrible! I ordered via website @ 3 pm on a sunday, would be ready for pick up in 20 mins. I show up 25 mins later. The 3 morons behind the counter  are walking around like zombies in slow motion. I stand at counter for a long 2 mins  while â€¦More

name: Alexis Andersen
text: If i could give zero stars I would. Placed a order went to pick it up, they didnt give me everything, got home and realized they shorted me a sandwich. Everyone on phones when I was in the store, no customer service, new girl on counter, â€¦More

name: Lea Zervas
text: Nice quiet little place off the side of a otherwise busy street. There's a huge hole in the parking lot that's rather concerning.

name: Double-Take Photography
text: Crispy fries and PG has the best pizza in New England!! ðŸ˜‹

name: Larry Rhodes
text: Much better now with new management

name: Brian Stacey
text: Online ordering system doesn't recognize our address even though the street has been here for six years. Said pizza would be delivered in 35 minutes, one hour in and still no pizza and they're not answering the phone. This is the second â€¦More

name: Timmy Malm
text: Ordered delivery online, 8:40 was the delivery time, when 9:30 pm rolled around and still no food we put a call in. Theu told us it would be another 30 minutes becuase "were swamped right now" well mind you this is the second time this has â€¦More

name: Joe Tammik
text: Slow service...no pizzas ready for lunch time slice specials...too long of a wait when limited lunch time

name: Ken Henault
text: Slow service with an empty restaurant. Chicken parmesan sandwich came out cold.  They said they had slices ready, and they took longer than the sandwich.  The most disgusting party was the counter clerk wearing a shirt that looks like it hasn't been washed in weeks.

name: Thomas Creasy
text: Decent pizza, fairly quick. Bathrooms were deplorable.

name: Pablo Acevedo SR
text: Okay for quick bite

name: Peter Brandao
text: It's a well run restaurant in a good location.

name: Steve Simon

text: Last time there for sure place was dirty workers were dirty but very polight
